QuestData.Title: Gloomshade Game Hunter
QuestData.Description: <You find a list on a piece of parchment.$b$bArsenio needs some ingredients for a new recipe he's preparing at your garrison.>
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find all the ingredients I need?
QuestData.RewardText: Nice! Thanks so much! I can use these to make a delicious wolf meat, frog leg, mushroom stew.
